Your Phone can truly do anything in China

Some of the Apps that you'll be using on your daily life

Everything in China is truly digital. Everything. It's a cashless society (most people don't carry cash/coins/credit cards) but rather pay with popular mobile Apps. Public bicycles/ebikes? Food delivery? Paying for the subway? Entering your building? Maid service? Movie tickets? Groceries delivered to your home? There is an App at identical prices as going to the store. We cannot stress enough how convenient life is in China.

37000 Km of high speed train

Makes traveling around China quick and easy

China is an exciting place to live with high
economic growth and low cost of living

But don't take our word on it, check out these external sources about cost of living and expats discussing their lives in China
